title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 204.6 - Appeal decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 204.6 - Appeal decision

State Regulations

After receipt of the appeal officer's report, the
commissioner will issue a final decision and serve a copy on the participant or
its representative. If the commissioner issues a final decision that includes
findings of fact or conclusions of law that conflict with the recommendations
of the appeal officer, the decision shall set forth the reasons
therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
204.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
